import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_words_starting_with_vowel(text):
    regex = ''
    words = re.findall(regex, text)
    frequency = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        frequency[word.lower()] += 1
    return frequency

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_words_starting_with_vowel(text):
    regex = '\\b[aeiouAEIOU]\\w*'
    words = re.findall(regex, text)
    frequency = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        frequency[word.lower()] -= 1
    return frequency

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_words_starting_with_vowel(text):
    regex = '\\b[aeiouAEIOU]\\w*'
    words = re.findall(regex, text)
    frequency = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        frequency[word.lower()] += 2
    return frequency

import re
from collections import defaultdict

def count_words_starting_with_vowel(text):
    regex = '\\b[aeiouAEIOU]\\w*'
    words = re.findall(regex, text)
    frequency = defaultdict(int)
    for word in words:
        frequency[word.lower()] += -1
    return frequency
